His parents named him John Winston Lennon after his paternal grandfather, John "Jack" Lennon, and Prime Minister Winston Churchill. His father was often away from home but sent regular pay cheques to 9 Newcastle Road, Liverpool, where Lennon lived with his mother; the cheques stopped when he went absent without leave in February 1944. query: Reword the text from 2015年7月，据透露，正式拍摄将于2016年春季开始，在此之前会先执行《神力女超人》的拍摄。正式拍摄于2016年4月11日在英国东南部的华纳兄弟利维斯登制片厂进行，其他拍摄地包括伦敦、苏格兰和冰岛。与查克·史奈德长期合作的摄影师方赖瑞因行程上的冲突而没法参与本片，所以改由法比安·华格纳担任摄影师。班·艾佛列克也被透露担任本片的执行制片人。2016年5月，据透露，杰夫·强斯和强·柏格将参与电影的制作，而他们也会继续参与《蝙蝠侠对超人：正义曙光》后的DC扩展宇宙电影。同月，杰瑞米·艾恩斯表示，《正义联盟》的故事会比《蝙蝠侠对超人：正义曙光》更加地直线和简单。强斯后来表示，本片将会比之前的DCEU电影更「充满希望和乐观」。摩莫亚在Instagram上透露，在伦敦的拍摄已截至2016年10月1日，接下来会于10月和整个11月在冰岛进行。 into English(en).

Ben Affleck was also revealed to be the executive producer of this film. Johnson later stated that this film will be more \"hopeful and optimistic\" than previous DCEU films. Momoya revealed on Instagram that filming in London has ended on October 1, 2016, and will continue in Iceland in October and throughout November."

Jeff Jones and John Berger participated in the production of the film, and they continued to participate in the DC Extended Universe movie after "Batman vs. Superman: Dawn of Justice".
